queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-postgres-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postgres}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-judge-server-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{judge}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-redis-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{redis}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-backend-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{backend}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-postgres-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postgres}}.volumeMounts.name={{release-name-storage}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-judge-server-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{judge}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-backend-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{backend}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-postgres-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postgres}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-redis-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{redis}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.
Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-judge-server-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{judge}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop does not include ALL or NET_RAW

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.
Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-redis-depl}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-judge-server-depl}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-postgres-depl}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-backend-depl}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public

metadata.namespace should be defined and not null
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-postgres-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{postgres}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache
metadata.name={{release-name-redis-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{redis}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-backend-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{backend}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-backend-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{backend}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-judge-server-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{judge}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-judge-server-depl}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{judge}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-redis-depl}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{redis}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-redis-depl}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{redis}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-postgres-depl}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{postgres}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-postgres-depl}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{postgres}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-judge-server-depl}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{judge}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-judge-server-depl}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{judge}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-backend-depl}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{backend}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-backend-depl}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{backend}}

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

metadata.name={{release-name-postgres-depl}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated
